meanings.definition: A type of hat with a flat crown and a narrow brim.
meanings.sent1: He wore a porkpie hat to the party.
meanings.sent2: The man tipped his porkpie to greet us.
meanings.sent3: The porkpie hat made him look like a detective.
meanings.sent4: Her porkpie hat cast a shadow over her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The porkpie hat sat jauntily on his head.

meanings.definition: A small savory pie filled with seasoned minced pork.
meanings.sent1: She baked a delicious porkpie for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sold out of porkpies quickly.
meanings.sent3: He joked that the porkpie was his secret weapon.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the porkpie filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The flaky crust of the porkpie melted in his mouth.
